description: Lower half of the Split Wide layout. Near small campfires, exhausted soldiers sit in silence while surgeons work in the background. Döbeln pauses beside a wounded man who weakly salutes. In the distance, crows circle above the quiet field.
narration: The field is theirs — but so is the sorrow.
info: Page 11 – Aftermath. PageType: Split Wide (2 panels). Scene (panel 2): night falls, campfires burn low, wounded tended amid silence and loss.
